TopicTitle: How do you view your own Visitor Messages?

Articles.Content: How do you view your own Visitor Messages? I can't find it for the life of me.

Hi cantab, if you click your "My Profile" button in the top right to go to your profile, you'll see the "Visitor Messages" tab between "My Activity" and "About Me" ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
